data.text: Yaa Waaqayyo, ani lubbuu koo gara keetti
Yaa Waaqa koo ani sin amanadha.
Namni si eeggatu tokko iyyuu
Yaa Waaqayyo, karaa kee na argisiisi;
ati Waaqa Fayyisaa koo waan taateef,
Yaa Waaqayyo, araara keetii fi jaalala kee yaadadhu;
Cubbuu afaan kootii
Waaqayyo gaarii dha; tolaadhas;
Warra gad of qaban waan qajeelaa ta始een geggeessa;
Karaan Waaqayyoo hundinuu
Yaa Waaqayyo, cubbuun koo guddaa ta始u iyyuu
Namni Waaqayyoon sodaatu eenyu?
Lubbuun isaa badhaadhummaadhaan jiraatti;
Waaqayyo icciitii isaa warra isa sodaatan duraa hin dhoksu;
Iji koo yeroo hunda gara Waaqayyoo ilaala;
Gara kootti garagali; garaas naa laafi;
Yaaddoon garaa kootii baay始ateera;
Dhiphina kootii fi rakkina koo ilaali;
Akka diinonni koo baay始atan,
Lubbuu koo eegi; na oolchis;
Waan ani si eeggadhuuf, amanamummaa fi
Yaa Waaqayyo, rakkina isaa hundumaa keessaa
